notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected areas with waters as detected by SPOT-6 and TerraSAR-X  imagery acquired the 16 September 2014 in Chiniot area along Chenab River, Punjab Province (Pakistan). The Chenab river expanded and seems to have inundated some agricultural fields. This analysis has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR /UNOSAT.
